com.gsma.mobileconnect.impl

Class DiscoveryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsma.mobileconnect.impl.DiscoveryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDiscovery

     class DiscoveryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDiscovery
    An implementation of IDiscovery.

    An instance of this class is constructed using the Factory which allows an implementation of IDiscoveryCache to be specified.

        public void startAutomatedOperatorDiscovery(IPreferences preferences,
                                   java.lang.String redirectURL,
                                   DiscoveryOptions specifiedOptions,
                                   java.util.List<KeyValuePair> currentCookies,
                                   IDiscoveryResponseCallback callback)
                                     throws DiscoveryException
        See IDiscovery.startAutomatedOperatorDiscovery(String, String, String, String, DiscoveryOptions, List, IDiscoveryResponseCallback)
        Specified by:
        startAutomatedOperatorDiscovery in interface IDiscovery
        Parameters:
        preferences - Instance of IPreferences that provides clientId, clientSecret and discoveryURL. (Required).
        redirectURL - The URL the operator selection functionality redirects to. (Required).
        specifiedOptions - Optional parameters. (Optional).
        currentCookies - List of current cookies the browser has sent. (Optional).
        callback - Used to capture the response. (Required).
        Throws:
        DiscoveryException

      • completeSelectedOperatorDiscovery

        public void completeSelectedOperatorDiscovery(IPreferences preferences,
                                     java.lang.String redirectURL,
                                     java.lang.String selectedMCC,
                                     java.lang.String selectedMNC,
                                     CompleteSelectedOperatorDiscoveryOptions specifiedOptions,
                                     java.util.List<KeyValuePair> currentCookies,
                                     IDiscoveryResponseCallback callback)
                                       throws DiscoveryException
        See IDiscovery.completeSelectedOperatorDiscovery(String, String, String, String, String, String, CompleteSelectedOperatorDiscoveryOptions, List, IDiscoveryResponseCallback)
        Specified by:
        completeSelectedOperatorDiscovery in interface IDiscovery
        Parameters:
        preferences - Instance of IPreferences that provides clientId, clientSecret and discoveryURL. (Required).
        redirectURL - The URL the operator selection functionality redirects to. If not specified http://localhost is assumed. (Optional).
        selectedMCC - The MCC of the selected operator. (Required).
        selectedMNC - The MNC of the selected operator. (Required).
        specifiedOptions - Optional parameters. (Optional).
        currentCookies - List of current cookies the browser has sent. (Optional).
        callback - Used to capture the response. (Required).
        Throws:
        DiscoveryException

      • isValidDiscoveryResponse

        private boolean isValidDiscoveryResponse(DiscoveryResponse discoveryResult)
        Does the Discovery Response hold valid data?
        Parameters:
        discoveryResult - The discovery response to examine.
        Returns:
        True is there is data and it is from the cache or the response code indicates it is valid.

      • addCachedValue

        void addCachedValue(DiscoveryCacheKey key,
                  DiscoveryResponse value)
        Add a value to the cache.

        Only operator identified responses are cached.

        Parameters:
        key - The cache key.
        value - The value to cache.

      • buildHttpGetForOperatorDiscovery

        private org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpGet buildHttpGetForOperatorDiscovery(java.net.URI discoveryURI,
                                                                      java.lang.String redirectURL,
                                                                      DiscoveryOptions options)
                                                                         throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Build a HttpGet for the Discovery Service.
        Parameters:
        discoveryURI - URI of the discovery service.
        redirectURL - The redirect URL to pass as a parameter.
        options - Optional parameters to the get.
        Returns:
        HttpGet to the Discovery Service to identify an operator.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • determineTtl

        java.util.Date determineTtl(java.lang.Long ttlTime)
        Determine the time-to-live for a discovery response.

        Ensure the ttl is between a minimum and maximum value.

        Parameters:
        ttlTime - The ttl value from the discovery result.
        Returns:
        The ttl to use.
